post.body: I thought the same btw thanks for the card
I think you may have killed their server...
weird- normally Norn Iron gets excluded from everything. I should be drawing, though...
it's his uncle Satan, I feel sorry for...
Hey, Happy Christmas, y'all - hope Santa brings you what you want...
going to the zoo then pizza hut for alfredo with my kids and my niece. And my new digital camera (opened a pressie early...)
Apple rejects e-book over objectionable content http://tinyurl.com/9vros9 - replace ebook with murderdrome and it's history repeating
feeling sorry for anyone who has to hit the town to buy pressies...
iphone idea: one giant registry of every app that has a url to run it-that way you could create an app manager that called each via its url
tired
face/off bbc 1 now.
disturbed by coca colas uncanny valley santa clause.
v for vendetta the movie has some great bits (where it sticks to the comic) and some bollocks (v falls in love? wtf?)
v for vendetta on bbc 2 tonight. Hoping it would be on BBC HD - but it's not - bbc hd has Herbie Fully Loaded. gah.
Just got a comment from a guy who wrote a dictionary app - rejected from the app store because it had 'objectionable' content!
freezing my ass off in my dads garage/office - but it's a relief to get out of the house!
Masked Marshal is STAFF PICK on the App Store - Hurrah!
Hurrah! I may have that 24 hour vomiting bug. Stomach cramps a go-go (no actual vomiting though).
wondering if GWBs reflexes are so good because none of the Secret Service are willing to take a bullet (or shoe) for him...
what comics are all about http://tinyurl.com/6gp42a
